Package com.gcu.business

Interface ProductBusinessInterface<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductBusinessService
public interface ProductBusinessInterface<T>
Interface for Product Business operations. The Generic T gives flexibility for different kinds of Product Models.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mason Blaut

    • init

      void init()
      Service Initialization Method

    • destroy

      void destroy()
      Service Destroy Method

    • test

      void test()
      Service Test Method

    • getProducts

      List<ProductModel> getProducts()
      Gets a List of all ProductModel objects.

    • findProductById

      ProductModel findProductById(String id)
      Returns a single ProductModel Object found by the id String
      Parameters:
      id - ProductModel's id String
      Returns:
      ProductModel to be sent to the view controller.

    • updateProduct

      boolean updateProduct(ProductModel product)
      Updates a ProductModel by passing a ProductModel to the Data Service. Returns a boolean upon completion.
      Parameters:
      product - ProductModel with updated values.
      Returns:
      boolean; true if the ProductModel was able to be edited and false if the operation from the data service failed.

    • create

      boolean create(T t)
      Creates a new Generic Product and pushes it to the Data Service.
      Parameters:
      t - Generic, but will most often be used as a ProductModel object.
      Returns:
      boolean: true for successful object creation in data service and false for failed creation.

    • deleteProduct

      boolean deleteProduct(T t)
      Deletes a Generic from the Data Service and calls the Data Service.
      Parameters:
      t - Generic object to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean: true for successful object deletion and false for failed object deletion from Data Service.
